thread.title: NC: Legislative leaders squelch light rail, boost roads and bridges
thread.title_full: NC: Legislative leaders squelch light rail, boost roads and bridges

title: NC: Legislative leaders squelch light rail, boost roads and bridges
text:
17 NC: Legislative leaders squelch light rail, boost roads and bridges 
The new state budget proposal deals a crippling blow to a planned $1.5 billion light-rail line from Durham to Chapel Hill, with a provision that would put a $500,000 limit on state funding for any light-rail project.The budget also raises Division of Motor Vehicles fees for the first time in 10 years, provides $700 million more to build and repair roads and bridges, restores state money for driverâ€™s education classes, and eliminates the jobs of 29 specific Department of Transportation employees.
